mapper.select: select * from extract_point where status like ${status};
mapper.insert: insert into extract_point (owner,open_id,id_number,name, phone_number, address, area, status) values (#{point.owner}, #{openId}, #{point.idNumber}, #{point.name}, #{point.phoneNumber}, #{point.address}, #{point.area},'正在休息')
mapper.update: update extract_point set status=#{status} where open_id=#{openId};
mapper.select: select * from extract_point where (latitude - #{latitude}) < #{disparity} and (longitude - #{latitude}) < #{disparity} where status='正在营业';
